data.title: Why do movies always depict guys/men as buffoons?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 6): More recently it seems, movies that empower women think a good way to do that is by making men useless, stupid, comic relief. It's getting ridiculous and sends a bad message for boys growing up. Women deserve to be treated equally. That doesn't mean we have to turn the tables and...
